description.value:
Moss and winding vines give this gnarled staff of wild wood a vibrant green tinge. You created this staff to aid you in speaking to the plants you met on your adventure and beseeching them to come to your aid.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Tangle Vine]
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Protector Tree] , @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Shillelagh]
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Entangling Flora], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Shape Wood]
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.One with Plants], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Wall of Thorns]
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Oaken Resilience], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Speak with Plants]
    Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
